p: Under the 2070-CCSM RCP 2.6 scenario, in south-central and southwestern China and the East Himalayas there would be potential habitats for D. involucrata ( Fig. 7B), although the total areas would be somewhat reduced (32.2%), especially within the Sichuan Basin. In addition, the probability of suitable habitats in the northern area bordering the Sichuan Basin (i.e., SE Guansu) would be very low (<0.20) ( Fig. 7B). Notably, most of the potential habitats are included within those now existing (92.3%; Fig. 7C and Table 1). The predicted suitable habitats with high probability (0.5‒1) would account for 37.3% of all the area of potential habitats (threshold‒1) ( Table 1).
